A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The circle is now complete. The prequels gave us a great story\, with embarrassing casting and uninspired acting. Now Disney offers us beautiful visuals and great acting\, but a nonsensical and internally inconsistent plot that  sacrifices the validity of the universe it honots for the sake of accommodating lazy writing\, and selling new toys to kids. How is it possible for a script with this many plot holes to make it off the drawing board?
